scripts.consoleTsNodeEsm: npx ts-node-esm -e 'const a = () => console.log("Hello, world!"); a();'
scripts.consoleTsNodeEsmExport: npx ts-node-esm -e 'const a = () => console.log("Hello, world!"); a(); export {a}'
scripts.consoleTsNode: npx ts-node -e 'const a = () => console.log("Hello, world!"); a(); export {a}'
